title: Dienders
overview: Bart, Bjorn, Harun, Louanne, Michiel, Nanouk, Sammuel and Viggo have been admitted to the Police Academy in Rotterdam after a strict selection. They are motivated to the core and they take on the challenge together in good spirits. They quickly take to the streets of Rotterdam in uniform for the first time, where they have to deal with insults and discrimination, among other things. Can everyone handle the stress and high work pressure?
